name: Colourful David
description:
David is a colourful boy living in a drab world. He's trying to brighten the place up a bit with his magic torch. Can you help?

Colourful David was developed for RainbowJam17

https://itch.io/jam/rainbowjam17

Devlog - https://itch.io/jam/rainbowjam17/topic/135554/dev-log-colourful-david

There is one known bug - if you get two beams pointing at the same 'beam modifier' object it can get confused. If this happens simply move the object to a different location which should reset it.

If you find any other issues please let me know!
